chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
L: Language
Gamma: Derivable L
bSC: BasicSequentCalculus L Gamma

Goal:
forall P : context -> Prop, derivable_superset_preserved P -> superset_preserved P

Premises:
BasicSequentCalculus : forall L : Language, Derivable L -> Prop
Record Derivable (L : Language) : Type := Build_Derivable { derivable : context -> expr -> Prop } For Build_Derivable: Argument scopes are [_ function_scope]
superset_preserved = fun (A : Type) (P : Ensemble A -> Prop) => forall Phi Psi : Ensemble A, Included A Phi Psi -> P Phi -> P Psi : forall A : Type, (Ensemble A -> Prop) -> Prop Argument A is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope]
derivable_superset_preserved = fun P : context -> Prop => forall Phi Psi : context, Included expr (derivable Phi) (derivable Psi) -> P Phi -> P Psi : (context -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scope is [function_scope]
context = fun L : Language => expr -> Prop : Language -> Type Argument L is implicit and maximally inserted
superset_preserved_same_set_preserved : forall P : Ensemble ?A -> Prop, superset_preserved P -> Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful (Same_set ?A) iff) P where ?A : [L : Language Gamma : Derivable L bSC : BasicSequentCalculus L Gamma |- Type]
not_superset_preserved_subset_preserved : forall P : Ensemble ?A -> Prop, superset_preserved P -> subset_preserved (fun X : Ensemble ?A => ~ P X) where ?A : [L : Language Gamma : Derivable L bSC : BasicSequentCalculus L Gamma |- Type]
not_derivable_superset_preserved_derivable_subset_preserved : forall P : context -> Prop, derivable_superset_preserved P -> derivable_subset_preserved (fun X : context => ~ P X)
derivable_subset_preserved_subset_preserved : forall P : context -> Prop, derivable_subset_preserved P -> subset_preserved P
Ensembles_ext.Union_Empty_left : forall P : Ensemble ?A, Same_set ?A (Union ?A (Empty_set ?A) P) P where ?A : [L : Language Gamma : Derivable L bSC : BasicSequentCalculus L Gamma |- Type]
Ensembles_ext.right_Included_Union : forall P Q : Ensemble ?A, Included ?A Q (Union ?A P Q) where ?A : [L : Language Gamma : Derivable L bSC : BasicSequentCalculus L Gamma |- Type]
deduction_weaken0 : forall (Phi : context) (y : expr), |-- y -> Phi |-- y where ?L : [L : Language Gamma : Derivable L bSC : BasicSequentCalculus L Gamma |- Language] ?Gamma : [L : Language Gamma : Derivable L bSC : BasicSequentCalculus L Gamma |- Derivable ?L] ?bSC : [L : Language Gamma : Derivable L bSC : BasicSequentCalculus L Gamma |- BasicSequentCalculus ?L ?Gamma] ?GammaP : [L : Language Gamma : Derivable L bSC : BasicSequentCalculus L Gamma |- Provable ?L] ?SC : [L : Language Gamma : Derivable L bSC : BasicSequentCalculus L Gamma |- NormalSequentCalculus ?L ?GammaP ?Gamma]
Kdenotation : forall M : Kmodel, Semantics L ?MD -> expr -> Ensemble (Kworlds M) where ?MD : [L : Language Gamma : Derivable L bSC : BasicSequentCalculus L Gamma |- Model] ?kMD : [L : Language Gamma : Derivable L bSC : BasicSequentCalculus L Gamma |- KripkeModel ?MD]
Decidable.dec_not_not : forall P : Prop, Decidable.decidable P -> (~ P -> False) -> P
build_model : forall M : Kmodel, Kworlds M -> model where ?MD : [L : Language Gamma : Derivable L bSC : BasicSequentCalculus L Gamma |- Model] ?KripkeModel : [L : Language Gamma : Derivable L bSC : BasicSequentCalculus L Gamma |- KripkeModel ?MD]
BinInt.Z.bi_induction : forall P : BinNums.Z -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful BinInt.Z.eq iff) P -> P BinNums.Z0 -> (forall x : BinNums.Z, P x <-> P (BinInt.Z.succ x)) -> forall z : BinNums.Z, P z
contextual_derivable_finite_witnessed : forall (Phi Psi : context) (y : expr), Union expr Phi Psi |-- y -> exists xs : list expr, Forall Psi xs /\ Union expr Phi (fun x : expr => In x xs) |-- y where ?L : [L : Language Gamma : Derivable L bSC : BasicSequentCalculus L Gamma |- Language] ?Gamma : [L : Language Gamma : Derivable L bSC : BasicSequentCalculus L Gamma |- Derivable ?L] ?bSC : [L : Language Gamma : Derivable L bSC : BasicSequentCalculus L Gamma |- BasicSequentCalculus ?L ?Gamma] ?fwSC : [L : Language Gamma : Derivable L bSC : BasicSequentCalculus L Gamma |- FiniteWitnessedSequentCalculus ?L ?Gamma]
provable_derivable : forall x : expr, |-- x < -> empty_context |-- x where ?L : [L : Language Gamma : Derivable L bSC : BasicSequentCalculus L Gamma |- Language] ?GammaP : [L : Language Gamma : Derivable L bSC : BasicSequentCalculus L Gamma |- Provable ?L] ?GammaD : [L : Language Gamma : Derivable L bSC : BasicSequentCalculus L Gamma |- Derivable ?L] ?NormalSequentCalculus : [L : Language Gamma : Derivable L bSC : BasicSequentCalculus L Gamma |- NormalSequentCalculus ?L ?GammaP ?GammaD]
derivable_finite_witnessed : forall (Phi : context) (y : expr), Phi |-- y -> exists xs : list expr, Forall Phi xs /\ (fun x : expr => In x xs) |-- y where ?L : [L : Language Gamma : Derivable L bSC : BasicSequentCalculus L Gamma |- Language] ?Gamma : [L : Language Gamma : Derivable L bSC : BasicSequentCalculus L Gamma |- Derivable ?L] ?FiniteWitnessedSequentCalculus : [L : Language Gamma : Derivable L bSC : BasicSequentCalculus L Gamma |- FiniteWitnessedSequentCalculus ?L ?Gamma]
derivable_subset_preserved = fun P : context -> Prop => forall Phi Psi : context, Included expr (derivable Phi) (derivable Psi) -> P Psi -> P Phi : (context -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scope is [function_scope]
derivable = fun (L : Language) (Derivable0 : Derivable L) => let (derivable) := Derivable0 in derivable : forall L : Language, Derivable L -> context -> expr -> Prop Arguments L, Derivable are implicit and maximally inserted
consistent = fun (L : Language) (Gamma : Derivable L) (Phi : context) => exists x : expr, ~ Phi |-- x : forall L : Language, Derivable L -> context -> Prop Arguments L, Gamma are implicit and maximally inserted
Zabs.Zabs_ind : forall (P : BinNums.Z -> Prop) (n : BinNums.Z), (BinInt.Z.ge n BinNums.Z0 -> P n) -> (BinInt.Z.le n BinNums.Z0 -> P (BinInt.Z.opp n)) -> P (BinInt.Z.abs n)
empty_context = fun L : Language => Empty_set expr : forall L : Language, context Argument L is implicit and maximally inserted
Ensembles_ext.Intersection_is_Complement_Union : (forall P : Prop, P \/ ~ P) -> forall (U : Type) (A B : Ensemble U), Same_set U (Intersection U A B) (Complement U (Union U (Complement U A) (Complement U B)))
OmegaLemmas.fast_Zred_factor6 : forall (x : BinNums.Z) (P : BinNums.Z -> Prop), P (BinInt.Z.add x BinNums.Z0) -> P x
Build_Derivable : forall L : Language, (context -> expr -> Prop) -> Derivable L
Forall_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : list A -> Prop), P0 nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Forall P l -> P0 l -> P0 (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, Forall P l -> P0 l
OmegaLemmas.fast_Zred_factor0 : forall (x : BinNums.Z) (P : BinNums.Z -> Prop), P (BinInt.Z.mul x (BinNums.Zpos BinNums.xH)) -> P x
VectorDef.t_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> Prop), P 0 (VectorDef.nil A) -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), P n t -> P (S n) (VectorDef.cons A h n t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), P n t
OmegaLemmas.fast_Zopp_eq_mult_neg_1 : forall (x : BinNums.Z) (P : BinNums.Z -> Prop), P (BinInt.Z.mul x (BinNums.Zneg BinNums.xH)) -> P (BinInt.Z.opp x)
Forall_impl : forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall a : A, P a -> Q a) -> forall l : list A, Forall P l -> Forall Q l
OmegaLemmas.fast_Zplus_comm : forall (x y : BinNums.Z) (P : BinNums.Z -> Prop), P (BinInt.Z.add y x) -> P (BinInt.Z.add x y)
ssrbool.equivP : forall (P Q : Prop) (b : bool), Bool.reflect P b -> P < -> Q -> Bool.reflect Q b
OmegaLemmas.fast_Zred_factor5 : forall (x y : BinNums.Z) (P : BinNums.Z -> Prop), P y -> P (BinInt.Z.add (BinInt.Z.mul x BinNums.Z0) y)
